      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBidTest1()
      Tests the addBid method, it checks that after a successful addition of a bid the information of a bid is set correctly
      void addBidTest2()
      Tests the addBid method, it checks the return of the method is correct.
      void addBidTest3()
      Tests the addBid method when the Auction is in a state when no bids can be made (unavailable).
      void addBidTest4()
      Tests the addBid method when the bid price is below the auction bas price.

      Tests the daysRemaining method when its expected result is maximum

      Tests the getMaxBidTest method when no bids have been made and has been cancelled.

      Tests the isAvailable method when the auction is in the closed state

      Tests the isAvailable method when the auction is in the running state
      void isAvailableTest4()
      Tests the isAvailable method when the auction is in the opened state
